channel.title: Combind Client & a Source
channel.description:
Erm if i wont to make a client server i download a client + the source i run the source en then i open my client i put my IP from No-Ip but some stuff still don't work en if i go look to my Client Run i see much
at Applet_Subi1 .mouseClicked<Unknown Source> at java.awt.component.processMouseEvent<Unknown Source> ... .. .
How do i fix this?:S i Got JDK 6 Update 7 -.- (i don't know how to work whit JDK)
Can some1 Help Me?:|
